TopicTitle: I need someone to do something fairly easy for me

Articles.Content:
Basically, I need you to take Aerojet Kerbodyne, remove all the service module stuff that SDHI already has, and merge it with SDHI

Why I don't do it myself:

I already tried. I failed miserably. I want someone with actual modding experience (unlike me) to do this.

Edited November 1, 2014 by SpaceLaunchSystem

uhh that wouldn't work since version 3 of Aerojet Kerbodyne due to the custom service modules it packs now so the better option would be to just have Aerojet Kerbodyne installed and only the paradocks and aeroshell installed for SDHI...

of course you could just delete the folders that contain the parts which is dead easy and if your unsure of what part you're deleting just look in the cfgs to make sure
